comment: This is a rectangular text box containing ancient Chinese characters (likely from a dictionary or classical text such as the *Shuowen Jiezi*), with large seal script characters on the left and smaller explanatory text in regular script to their right. The layout is vertical, typical of traditional Chinese printing. The box has a thick black border and is centered on the page. On the left margin outside the box, there are annotations including '大三十' and '張信', likely indicating volume/page number and author/publisher.
